message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a fantastic item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. It's a great deal, and I think you won't find a better price anywhere else!
I'm interested in the product, but $90 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I understand your concern about the price, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $75. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $82. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $82 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $78. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $78. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer: I'll sell it to you for $85. It's still a great price, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $85 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
